document.docAuthor: Franco, José Carlos, Russo, Agatino & Marotta, Salvatore
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) of Portugal, including Madeira and Azores Archipelagos

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) of Portugal, including Madeira and Azores Archipelagos

subSubSection.paragraph:
Comments: first record; collected (
28 -09- 2007
) and identified by Giuseppina Pellizzari on
Quercus suber
near Palmela, in the A 2 highway between Lisbon and Setúbal.

Comments:
Podsiadlo ( 1990 )
and
Stumpf & Lambdin ( 2006 )
considered
Asterodiaspis quercicola
and
A. variolosa
to be synonyms, but this is not accepted by
Ben-Dov ( 2006 )
.

References:
Lindinger ( 1912 )
,
Green ( 1923 )
,
Neves ( 1936 a
,
1936 c
,
1950 , 1954
b),
Balachowsky ( 1938 )
,
Russell ( 1941 )
,
Seabra ( 1942 )
,
Guimarães ( 1973 )
,
Vieira et al. ( 1983 )
,
Kozár & Franco ( 1995 )
,
Borges et al . ( 2008 )
,
Ben-Dov et al . ( 2010 )
,
Danzig & Watson ( 2010 )
.

,

.

.
